name: Ooga Booga (itch) (BingSlasher)
description:
An entry for the Mix and Jam game jam 2020 Top down shooter X Crafting  A top down shooter where you need to craft your own ammunition Instructions - ctrl + scroll to see the whole game, fullscreen doesn't always work Move with WASD Left click - Throw spear / chop down tree
Right click - Place wooden boxes to block enemies
SpaceBar - Make new spear
Q - Discard rock Programming - Hadar Meron Art - Roy Porat
